about_the_game:
For any questions, please contact us: uroborosstudio@outlook.com
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Have you ever climbed the ancient pixelated Tower Of The Sorcerer, ascending and descending, just to defeat the Demon King and save the princess? Now, you're entering an unknown open world! Here, you'll encounter a greater variety of monsters, richer environments, and a more flexible exploration experience. But don’t worry, you've become stronger too! Not only can you immediately see through your enemies’ strengths, but you'll also have access to a wide array of weapons to use, upgrade, and craft. While retaining classic elements, we've also introduced modern gameplay features. Don’t hesitate—start a brand new adventure now!

⭐ Intuitive enemy damage values

You can activate the scouting feature anytime, anywhere, to view the damage values during battles with enemies.

Moreover, the enemies' attributes and traits will automatically be recorded in the encyclopedia for you to review.

⭐ Freely switch between two weapon sets

Sticking with one playstyle from start to finish can be dull, so weapon sets offer more possibilities.

You can equip two different sets of main and secondary weapons and switch between them freely.

Paired with the scouting system, this will help you make more informed decisions.

⭐ Weapon enhancement and crafting

You can enhance your starting ordinary weapon so it stays with you throughout the game.

Or, you can collect rare weapons and combine them to forge legendary gear!

⭐ Open-world free exploration

The once-restrictive up-and-down stairways will no longer limit your journey.

Before you lies a vast expanse of land.

You can head straight to your destination or explore every nook and cranny.

⭐ Diverse monsters

The current version already includes over 100 monsters!

Some are cute and quirky, while others are fearsome and menacing.

They even share evolutionary relationships.

⭐ Rich environments

There are five terrains in total: forest, desert, volcano, snowfield, and castle.

Each terrain comes with unique environments and background music.

And when you return to the title screen, there might even be a surprise waiting for you!

⭐ Hidden levels and side quests

As mentioned, this is an expansive open world.

Naturally, some hidden secrets lurk in the far corners.

Your actions may also influence the fates of others in unexpected ways.

name: Dimensional Warrior

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0ghz
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM / OpenGL 2.1+ support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Graphics: 4000 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

short_description: This is a strategy RPG inspired by classic Tower Of The Sorcerer. In addition to the core gameplay, we've added numerous new elements such as a weapon system and an open world. We believe these features will provide you with a fresh and exciting experience!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
